Articles.Content:
I know that official release of final version of KSP can be realised any day and I'm very excited :-)

Sadly I'm not have time to play :-(

I wonder does we will have something like KSP for mobile devices?

If you'll peruse our [thread=36863]What Not to Suggest List[/thread] for a moment, you'll see that "Use of other hardware platforms or operating system types" is one of its many entries. As such, I'll have to close this one.

However, there are some existing mobile apps that bear some similarity to KSP. I've heard Simple Rockets named multiple times before; it might be what you're after.
